title: Brick Lane - The description implies that Chanu

content.prompt: The description in the sentences “Chanu bought...head” implies that Chanu

choices.label: seeks to impress his new acquaintances in the city
does not normally wear such items
would prefer to stay home rather than leave the house

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
